The relaps'd apostate, or, Notes upon a Presbyterian pamphlet, entituled, A petition for peace, &c. wherein the faction and design are laid as open as heart can wish by Roger L'Estrange. L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
[16], 85 p.
Printed for Henry Brome ..., London : 1641 [i.e. 1661]
First edition. Advertisement on p. [9]-[10]. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
